mapper.select: SELECT proc.mchn_name AS mchnName, proc.proc_cd_name AS procCdName, (SELECT fin_prd_cd_name FROM BF_CMN_FINISH_PRODUCT_CODE WHERE fin_prd_cd_code = detail.fin_prd_cd_code) AS prodName, detail.inst_prod_indica_vol AS indicaVol, proc.total_prod_vol AS totalVol, proc.in_dtl_vol, proc.flty_vol AS fltyVol, proc.achie_rate AS achieRate, detail.work_date AS workDate FROM BF_PROD_PROCESS proc, BF_PROD_INST_DETAIL detail WHERE proc.inst_prod_no = detail.inst_prod_no AND TO_CHAR(detail.work_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') = #{toDay}
